THE HONOURABLE MR. JUSTICE BECHU KURIAN THOMAS

CRL.MC NO. 519 OF 2024
CRIME NO.48/2011 OF OLLUR POLICE STATION, THRISSUR
AGAINST THE ORDER/JUDGMENT CC 136/2016 OF JUDICIAL MAGISTRATE
OF FIRST CLASS -III, THRISSUR

INDIRA, AGED 44 YEARS
W/O.RAMACHANDRAN, CHAMAKKALAYAIL HOUSE,

STATE OF KERALA

OLLUR POLICE STATION, THRISSUR DISTRICT,
THROUGH THE PUBLIC PROSECUTOR,
HIGH COURT OF KERALA AT ERNAKULAM, PIN - 682031
SMT. V. SREEJA (PP)
THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON
18.01.2024, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING:

2024/KER/4447
CRL.MC 519/2024
2
BECHU KURIAN THOMAS, J
arena
ORDER
Petitioner is the sole accused in C.C.No.136/2016 on the files of
the Judicial First Class Magistrate Court-III, Thrissur; alleging
offences punishable under Sections 406 and 420 of the Indian
Penal Code, 1860. Since the petitioner failed to appear before
the trial court on the date of posting, a warrant has been
issued, and proceedings have been initiated under Sections 82
and 83, of Cr.P.C. Hence, this petition.

2. Sri.N.L.Bitto, the learned counsel for the petitioner, submitted
that petitioner is willing to appear before the trial court, and
seek bail and also participate in the proceedings without _ fail.
However, petitioner apprehends that she may be remanded to
custody.

3. I have heard Smt.Sreeja V., the learned Public Prosecutor as
well.

2024/KER/4447
CRL.MC 519/2024
3

4. Having regard to the circumstances arising in the case, I am
of the view that this Crl.M.C. can be disposed of with a
direction.

5. Accordingly, there will be a direction to the Judicial First Class
Magistrate Court-III, Thrissur, to consider the application for
recall of warrant and for grant of bail, positively on the same
day itself, provided such applications are filed by the petitioner
on or before 29.01.2024.

The Crl.M.C.is disposed of.
sd/-
BECHU KURIAN THOMAS
JUDGE
AMV/19/01/2024
